ovdesc.p: AZ AZ.AMOUNT.TYPE This file is used to define the different amount types which are handled in AZ account. This amount types are used while settling the appropriate loan components say Principal, Interest, Charges, etc., This file is referred when an amount type is defined in AZ.SETTLEMENT.PRIORITY application.

This key field identifies the type of the amount allowed in the AZ.SETTLEMENT.PRIORITY application. The base types that are allowed are: (1) PR – Principal (2) IN – Interest and (3) CH – Charge. The base types or amount types from PD.AMOUNT.TYPE could be combined with OD to form a valid type.

: 2-5 alphanumeric characters are allowed as given below. 1) All the base types – PR, IN, CH 2) Base types preceded by GR - GR.PR, GR.IN 3) Base types or amount types from PD.AMOUNT.TYPE in combination with OD. Eg: OD.PR, OD.IN, OD.A1, OD.WE etc., Input to this field is mandatory.
This is a standard T24 multilingual field which holds the description about this amount type record.
: 3-35 alphanumeric characters are allowed. Input to this field is mandatory.
